SEARCH
Module org.example
Package org.example

Class MainPageController

java.lang.Object
org.example.MainPageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainPageController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The MainPageController class is responsible for controlling the main page of the application. It handles user interactions and displays various components such as products, shopping cart, and user account information. The class implements the Initializable interface to initialize the JavaFX components and define the behavior of the main page.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainPageController

      public MainPageController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the main page by setting up the initial state and loading data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL location of the FXML file.
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle containing locale-specific objects.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user and redirects to the login page. Prompts the user for confirmation before logging out. If confirmed, hides the current window and opens the login page in a new window. If canceled, no action is taken.

    • chooseCategory

      public void chooseCategory()
      Allows the user to choose a category from the predefined list of categories. Populates the product_category ComboBox with the available categories. When a category is selected, it queries the database for products belonging to that category and displays them.

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart()
      Adds the selected product to the shopping cart. Performs a validation check on the available amount before adding. Displays an error message if the available amount is insufficient. Inserts the product into the database and displays a success message. Refreshes the cart view.

    • selectedOrder

      public void selectedOrder()
      Retrieves the selected order from the table view. Gets the product ID and name of the selected item. If no item is selected, returns without further action.

    • removeProductFromCart

      public void removeProductFromCart()
      Removes the selected product from the shopping cart. Performs a validation check on the selected product. Deletes the product from the database and displays a success message. Refreshes the cart view.

    • search

      public void search()
      Executes a search query based on the searchLabel text. Displays the search results in the product view.

    • showAll

      public void showAll()
      Displays all products in the product view.

    • onClickSearch

      public void onClickSearch()
      Handles the onClick event for the search button. Shows the search pane and hides the chosen product pane.

    • createOreder

      public void createOreder()
      Creates an order based on the selected products in the shopping list. Generates an order ID and order date. Inserts the order and ordered products into the database. Deletes the products from the shopping list. Displays a success message and refreshes the cart view.

    • updatePersonalData

      public void updatePersonalData()
      Updates the personal data of the current user. Executes an SQL query to update the user information. Refreshes the personal data view and displays a success message.

    • updateAddressData

      public void updateAddressData()
      Updates the address data of the current user. Executes an SQL query to update the address information. Refreshes the address view and displays a success message.

    • showAccount

      public void showAccount()
